title: Ticket #6362: condor_ssh_to_job fails when SELinux is active
description:
Oliver Freyermuth on HTCondor users reports:

SELinux policies prevent running ssh-keygen on the startd machine. SELinux denies permission to write the generated keys to pool/condor/dir_<PID>/.condor_ssh_to_job_1/ . Is this already fixed in a new version of HTCondor? This breaks on CentOS 7 out of the box.
